products.name: Royal Canin Adult Cat Food 7kg

products.name: Temptations Classic Cat Treats Chicken Flavor 450g
products.description: Irresistibly tasty cat treats with less than 2 calories per treat. Crunchy outside, soft inside. Contains essential vitamins and minerals. No artificial flavors.

products.name: INABA Churu Cat Treats Tuna Variety 50 Tubes
products.description: Creamy, lickable cat treats made with farm-raised chicken and wild-caught tuna. Grain-free, preservative-free. High moisture content. Great for picky eaters.

products.name: SmartyKat Skitter Critters Cat Toy Mice 10 Pack

products.name: Nature's Miracle Self-Cleaning Litter Box

products.name: Furminator Deshedding Tool for Cats Short Hair
